text: evadaite visvasincina taruvata, allah nu tiraskaristado - tana hrdayam santrptikaramaina visvasanto nindi undi, balavantanga tiraskarincevadu tappa - mariyu evaraite hrdayapurvakanga satyatiraskaraniki palpadataro, alanti varipai allah agraham (dusana) virucuku padutundi. Mariyu vari koraku ghoramaina siksa untundi
